descriptions: Implemented a Natural Language Processing (NLP) system to extract company revenue information from reports, achieving 83% accuracy.
Architected a custom knowledge graph and algorithms, boosting data retrieval rates by over 50%.
Established NLP applications for document entities extraction, attaining 94% accuracy in data retrieval.
Developed a business product incorporating GenAI features through full stack development with Python and React.js, improving proposal writing efficiency.
Conducted in-depth research on emerging AI technologies, identifying potential implementation strategies.
Implemented, maintained, and supported system and network.
Administrated OS, servers and configuration, and Oracle database server.
